personal.name: Yusuf Atakan AKYÜZ
personal.bio: I studied at a science high school and am currently pursuing Computer Science Engineering at the University of Pécs Faculty of Engineering and Information Technologies. I am passionate about programming, networking, and electronics. I have experience creating game scripts using Lua for diverse gameservers as well as developing websites for a variety of clients. I excel in teamwork. In my spare time, I enjoy reading books, watching TV series, visiting historic places, and learning different languages.

education.institution: UPFEIT, University of Pécs Faculty of Engineering and Information Technologies

projects.title: Web Shop Project for Art Shops
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive web shop platform that includes client-side and server-side data management and networking.

projects.title: Garrysmod and FiveM Game Mods
projects.description: Detailed gamemode designs and developments for Garrysmod and FiveM.

projects.title: UI Designs
projects.description: A collection of various UI designs demonstrating my skills in visual design and user interface development.
